trans-unit.source: Specifies the data source and data member properties for a component that supports complex data binding.
trans-unit.target: 指定的資料來源和元件，可支援複雜資料繫結的資料成員屬性。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute is used to specify the properties used with complex data binding, such as binding based on <xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute 用來指定使用複雜資料繫結，例如<xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Collections.IList?displayProperty=fullName>為基礎的繫結的內容

trans-unit.source: The ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute attribute is specified at the class level.
trans-unit.target: ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute 屬性會指定在類別層級。

trans-unit.source: It is inheritable and does not allow multiple attributes on the same class.
trans-unit.target: 它是繼承的並不允許在相同類別上的多個屬性。

trans-unit.source: A control can support both simple binding, with <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute>, as well as complex binding.
trans-unit.target: 控制項可以支援這兩個簡單的繫結與<xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute>，以及複雜繫結。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultBindingPropertyAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需屬性用法的詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class using no parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref>類別不使用任何參數。

trans-unit.source: The default constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> properties to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 預設建構函式集<xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A>屬性`null`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class using the specified data source.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref>類別使用指定的資料來源。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> property to `dataSource` and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>屬性`dataSource`和<xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A>屬性`null`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to be used as the data source.
trans-unit.target: 要做為資料來源的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class using the specified data source and data member.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref>類別使用指定的資料來源和資料成員。

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> property to `dataSource` and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> property to `dataMember`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式設定<xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>屬性`dataSource`和<xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A>屬性`dataMember`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to be used as the data source.
trans-unit.target: 要做為資料來源的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the property to be used as the source for data.
trans-unit.target: 要做為資料來源的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the data member property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
trans-unit.target: 取得元件的資料成員屬性的名稱<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref>繫結。

trans-unit.source: The DataMember property is set in the constructors for this class.
trans-unit.target: DataMember 屬性是設定這個類別的建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data member property for the component to which <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound
trans-unit.target: 資料成員屬性名稱的元件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref>繫結

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the data source property for the component to which the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
trans-unit.target: 取得元件的資料來源屬性的名稱<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref>繫結。

trans-unit.source: The DataSource property is set in the constructors for this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的建構函式中，已設定 DataSource 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The name of the data source property for the component to which <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> is bound.
trans-unit.target: 目標元件的資料來源屬性的名稱<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref>繫結。

trans-unit.source: Represents the default value for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 代表的預設值為<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The Default member is a static, read-only field that defines an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute> class initialized with the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 預設成員是靜態的唯讀欄位定義的執行個體<xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute>類別預設建構函式以初始化。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref:System.Object> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否指定<xref:System.Object>是否等於目前<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref>執行個體。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The Equals method returns `true` if `obj` is of type <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> properties of the two objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: Equals 方法會傳回`true`如果`obj`的型別<xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A>屬性的兩個物件相等。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute.DataSource%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref> instance
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要與目前比較<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ComplexBindingPropertiesAttribute"></xref>執行個體</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is equal to the current instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, indicating they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果物件等於目前的執行個體;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，指出它們是否不相等。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。
